√kṣip 'throw'

present: [6.] kṣipáti etc. V.+  kṣipáte E.+  

perfect: cikṣepa etc. E.+  cikṣipe  

aorist: [1.] kṣipyāt  akṣepi   -- [3.] cikṣipat etc.   -- [4.] akṣaipsīt  akṣipta  

future: [1.] kṣepsyati etc. E.+  kṣepsyate   -- [2.] kṣeptā  

verbal: kṣiptá V.+  kṣipita  kṣeptum E.+  kṣeptos  kṣiptvā  -kṣipya E.+  -kṣepam  

secondary: passive: kṣipyate E.+  kṣipyant   -- intensive: cekṣip-   -- desiderative: cikṣipsa-   -- causative: kṣepayati etc. E.+  

derivatives: kṣíp  -kṣipa C.  kṣípā RV.  kṣipaṇí RV.  kṣipaṇú RV.  kṣipti C.  kṣiprá V.+  kṣepa E.+  kṣepaka E.+  -kṣepin C.  kṣepya C.  kṣepan B.  kṣepaṇa S.+  kṣépiṣṭha B.  kṣépīyas B.+  kṣeptavya E.+  kṣeptṛ E.+  kṣepnú RV.  -cikṣipsu C.
